equation:
\begin{equation}\int_{\bf R} \psi f \:d\mu_g = \Omega(Ef,\psi) \:\:\mbox{and}\:\:
\int_{\bf R} h(x)(Ef)(x) \: d\mu_g(x) = \Omega(Ef,Eh)
\label{psif}\:, 
\
\begin{equation}E=E_{\mbox{\scriptsize in}} +E_{\mbox{\scriptsize out}}\:, \label{E+E}\

\begin{equation}E_{\mbox{\scriptsize in}}((u',v'),(u,v))= \frac{1}{4}\mbox{sign}(v-v') \:\:\mbox{whereas}\:\:
 E_{\mbox{\scriptsize out}}((u',v'),(u,v))= \frac{1}{4}\mbox{sign}(u-u')\:.\label{E+E'}\

\begin{equation}\hat{\phi}(f)=\hat{\phi}_{\mbox{\scriptsize in}}(f) + \hat{\phi}_{\mbox{\scriptsize out}}(f)
  \:\:\:\:\mbox{with}\:\:\:\: \hat{\phi}_{\mbox{\scriptsize in/out}}(f):=\Omega(E_{\mbox{\scriptsize in/out}}f,\hat\phi) 
  \label{decm=0}\

\begin{equation}(Hf)(E) := Ef(E) \:\:\:\: \mbox{with domain ${\cal D}(H) = \{f\in L^2(\bR^+,dE) \:|\: \int_{0}^{+\infty} E^2 |f(E)|^2 dE <+\infty\}$}
\label{H} \:. \
\begin{equation}U^{{-1}}_{\bf F} \overline{H_{{\bf F}0}}{U}_{\bf F} = H \label{Holo}\:.\

\begin{equation} U_{\bf F} \hat A^{(H)}_\tau U^{-1}_{\bf F}= (U_{\bf F} \hat A U^{-1}_{\bf F})^{(H_{\bf F})}_{\tau}\:,
\
